mapper.select: SELECT entityId, topCcmtsSysTime, topCcmtsSysTimeZone, topCcmtsNtpserverAddress, topCcmtsSysTimeSynInterval, collectTime FROM cmcsystemtimeconfig WHERE entityId=#{entityId}
mapper.update: UPDATE cmcsystemtimeconfig SET topCcmtsSysTime=#{topCcmtsSysTime}, topCcmtsSysTimeZone=#{topCcmtsSysTimeZone}, topCcmtsNtpserverAddress=#{topCcmtsNtpserverAddress}, topCcmtsSysTimeSynInterval=#{topCcmtsSysTimeSynInterval}, collectTime=#{collectTime} WHERE entityId=#{entityId}
mapper.insert: insert into cmcsystemtimeconfig (entityId, topCcmtsSysTime, topCcmtsSysTimeZone, topCcmtsNtpserverAddress, topCcmtsSysTimeSynInterval, collectTime) values (#{entityId}, #{topCcmtsSysTime}, #{topCcmtsSysTimeZone}, #{topCcmtsNtpserverAddress}, #{topCcmtsSysTimeSynInterval}, #{collectTime})
